page.title: 01D Block:General Description
page.content: 'D Block lies on the western extremity of the city of Nottingham covering the eastern third of the grid.This area is covered by part of the Bilborough council housing estate and Wollaton Vale a private housing estate.Half of the village of Strelley lies in the N.E area of the grid.The remainder consists of the Parish of Trowell whose village lies in the S.W corner of the block.The majority of the block is made up of agricultural land with very little industry anywhere in the block apart from some small units and warehousing in the Bilborough area.Bisecting the block north to south is the M.1 motorway containing the Trowell service area.Running east to west along the bottom third is the Nottingham to Sheffield railway link and for NW to SE the now disused Nottingham canal.
